channel.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
channel.description:
Just took this test on tuesday for some college credit, thought they were pretty damn easy.
http://apcentral.collegeboard.com/apc/public/repository/ap_frq_computerscience_12.pdf
What do you think about them?(You probably aren't familiar with the case study so...)

item.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Taking it next year, I’ll most likely know most of the stuff being taught, if you guys say its easy.

Read full topic

item.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions

item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Is it better to take this or BC Calculus twice? I don’t have an available math my senior year so I’m stuck between AP computer science and AP BC Calc. BC Calc will be a repeat.

AS, it’s a joke

item.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

The book for this class is called “Fundamentals of Java”

(keyword being fundamentals)

The class is for people beginning to learn java. All it does is teach you the basics.

item.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

I took the class over something simple like multimedia, from what i understood they mainly just made gif’s and edited video’s in wmm, which sound just terrible.

The class itself is so simple, very very basic (They barely covered anything decently, and took nearly a month on recursion for some reason)

Read full topic
item.source: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions

item.title: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

AP CS is a joke. it should just be called programming or something as it doesn’t go at all into depth of anything worth wild.

edit: any decent university will laugh at you if you think you’ve accomplished anything by taking that course. furthermore, most good universities won’t even accept the credit for the course.

Read full topic
item.source: AP ® Computer Science A 2012 Free-Response Questions
